>From: Yahoo! Copyright <copyright@yahoo-inc.com>
>Sent: Jun 16, 2006 2:41 PM
>To: "Emerald City Productions, Inc." <edwardprzydzial@earthlink.net>
>Subject: Re: cease and desist mingya records (re: seduce debut cd) *  
>(KMM81666880V86283L0KM)
>
>Hello Edward,
>
>This email is a follow up to my second voice mail left for you. In 
>order to process your Notice of Infringement we do need some
clarification.
>Please return my call at:
>
>(408) 349-6162
>
>Regards,
>
>Copyright Agent, Yahoo! Inc.
>copyright@yahoo-inc.com
>****************************
>c/o Yahoo! Inc.
>701 First Ave.
>Sunnyvale, CA 94089
>
>
>
>Original Message Follows:
>-------------------------
>
>
>
>-----Forwarded Message-----
>>From: "Emerald City Productions, Inc." <edwardprzydzial@earthlink.net>
>>Sent: Jun 13, 2006 3:23 AM
>>To: kxcdman1@yahoo.com
>>Cc: copyright <pubcoinc@juno.com>
>>Subject: cease and desist mingya records (re: seduce debut cd) *
>>
>>Notice Of Copyright Infringement (NOI)
>>
>>Date:
>>
>>To: david r. corr <kxcdman1@yahoo.com>
>>
>>http://launch.groups.yahoo.com/group/LoveToHate/
>>
>>Dear Sirs:
>>
>>I, the undersigned, state **under penalty of perjury** that;
>>
>>I am the owner, or agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner, of
>certian intellectual property rights ("ip owner");
>>
>>I have a good faith belief that the listings identified (by item/link
>number) in the addendum attached hereto,
>>offer items or contain materials that are not authorized by the ip
>owner, its agent, or the law, and therefore
>>infringe the ip owner's rights and;
>>
>>The information in this notice is accurate.
>>
>>Please act expeditiously to remove the listings identified in this
>addendum.
>>
>>I may be contacted at: 
>>
>>edwardprzydzial.com
>>emeraldcityrecords.com
>>1615 wilcox avenue north # 3919
>>los angeles, california 90028
>>323.525.8007
>>emeraldcity1@earthlink.net
>>
>>In addition to the undersigned, the following persons have the proper
>authority to sign future
>>Notice of Copyright Infringement on behalf of the owner:
>>
>>http://www.eastdetroiter.blogspot.com/
>>
>>copyright @ <pubcoinc@juno.com>
>>
>>Truthfully,
>>
>>Edward B. Przydzial
>>Emerald City Productions, Inc.
>>
>>(c) ecpi-06-dmca
>>
>>dave:
>>
>>you need to remove the debut album cover, anything with the logo or 
>>the
>guitars on the cover
>>or any art generated from any of my designs. i told you before i own
>the copyright, if you look
>>around you'll see things are being shut down and anyone selling this 
>>is
>being stopped. if you do not
>>start to cooperate we are going to have another problem. don't think
>for a minute i won't pursue
>>my rights and you need to respect my art/copyrights. remove anything
>with my artwork on it at once.
>>
>>this includes, manipulated versions of the album, logo, t-shirts,
>posters, flyers, photos, dvd, cd etc.
>>
>>thank you,
>>
>>edd-
>
>
